minimum.c

00001 /* minimum.c -- output the minimum of a group of numbers ------- */
00002 
00003 #include "ext.h"
00004 
00005 typedef struct minimum
00006 {
00007     struct object m_ob;
00008     t_atom *m_args;
00009     long m_count;
00010     short m_incount;
00011     short m_outtype;
00012     void *m_out2;
00013     void *m_out;
00014 } t_minimum;
00015 
00016 typedef struct _big_atom {  // so we have double precision
00017     long a_type;
00018     long w_long;
00019     double w_float;
00020 } t_big_atom;
00021 
00022 void *minimum_class;
00023 
00024 void minimum_compare(t_big_atom *min, t_atom *newone, long *i, long *minIndex);
00025 void minimum_bang(t_minimum *x);
00026 void minimum_int(t_minimum *x, long n);
00027 void minimum_in1(t_minimum *x, long n);
00028 void minimum_float(t_minimum *x, double f);
00029 void minimum_ft1(t_minimum *x, double f);
00030 void minimum_list(t_minimum *x, t_symbol *s, short ac, t_atom *av);
00031 void minimum_assist(t_minimum *x, void *b, long m, long a, char *s);
00032 void minimum_inletinfo(t_minimum *x, void *b, long a, char *t);
00033 void *minimum_new(t_symbol *s, short ac, t_atom *av);
00034 void minimum_free(t_minimum *x);
00035 void minimum_resize(t_minimum *x, long size);
00036 
00037 int main()
00038 {
00039     setup((t_messlist **)&minimum_class, (method)minimum_new, (method)minimum_free, (short)sizeof(t_minimum), 0L, A_GIMME, 0);
00040     addbang((method)minimum_bang);
00041     addint((method)minimum_int);
00042     addinx((method)minimum_in1,1);
00043     addfloat((method)minimum_float);
00044     addftx((method)minimum_ft1,1);
00045     addmess((method)minimum_list,"list",A_GIMME,0);
00046     addmess((method)minimum_assist,"assist",A_CANT,0);
00047     addmess((method)minimum_inletinfo, "inletinfo", A_CANT, 0);
00048 
00049     return 0;
00050 }
00051 
00052 void minimum_compare(t_big_atom *min, t_atom *newone, long *i, long *minIndex)
00053 {
00054     double a, b;
00055     
00056     if (min->a_type==A_NOTHING) {
00057         min->a_type = newone->a_type;
00058         min->w_long = newone->a_w.w_long;
00059         min->w_float = newone->a_w.w_float;
00060         return;
00061     }
00062     if (min->a_type==A_FLOAT)
00063         a = min->w_float;
00064     else
00065         a = (double)min->w_long;
00066     if (newone->a_type == A_FLOAT)
00067         b = newone->a_w.w_float;
00068     else
00069         b = (double)newone->a_w.w_long;
00070     
00071     if (a <= b) {
00072         min->a_type = A_FLOAT;
00073         min->w_float = a;
00074     } else {
00075         *minIndex = *i;
00076         min->a_type = A_FLOAT;
00077         min->w_float = b;
00078     }
00079 }
00080 
00081 void minimum_bang(t_minimum *x)
00082 {
00083     long i;
00084     t_big_atom themin;
00085     long minIndex;
00086     long res;
00087     double fres;
00088     
00089     minIndex = 0;
00090     themin.a_type = A_NOTHING;
00091     for (i=0; i < x->m_count; i++)
00092         minimum_compare(&themin,x->m_args+i, &i, &minIndex);
00093 
00094     outlet_int(x->m_out2, minIndex);
00095     if (x->m_outtype==A_LONG) {
00096         if (themin.a_type==A_LONG)
00097             res = themin.w_long;
00098         else
00099             res = (long)themin.w_float;
00100         outlet_int(x->m_out,res);
00101     } else {
00102         if (themin.a_type==A_FLOAT)
00103             fres = themin.w_float;
00104         else
00105             fres = (float)themin.w_long;
00106         outlet_float(x->m_out,fres);
00107     }
00108 }
00109 
00110 void minimum_int(t_minimum *x, long n)
00111 {
00112     SETLONG(x->m_args,n);
00113     minimum_bang(x);
00114 }
00115 
00116 void minimum_in1(t_minimum *x, long n)
00117 {
00118     t_atom tmp;
00119     
00120     tmp = x->m_args[0];
00121     minimum_resize(x,2);    
00122     x->m_args[0] = tmp;
00123     SETLONG(x->m_args+1,n);
00124     x->m_count = 2;
00125 }
00126 
00127 
00128 void minimum_float(t_minimum *x, double f)
00129 {
00130     SETFLOAT(x->m_args,f);
00131     minimum_bang(x);
00132 }
00133 
00134 void minimum_ft1(t_minimum *x, double f)
00135 {
00136     t_atom tmp;
00137     
00138     tmp = x->m_args[0];
00139     minimum_resize(x,2);    
00140     x->m_args[0] = tmp;
00141     SETFLOAT(x->m_args+1,f);
00142     x->m_count = 2;
00143 }
00144 
00145 void minimum_list(t_minimum *x, t_symbol *s, short ac, t_atom *av)
00146 {
00147     short i;
00148 
00149     minimum_resize(x,ac);   
00150     for (i=0; i < ac; i++,av++) {
00151         if (av->a_type==A_LONG)
00152             SETLONG(x->m_args+i,av->a_w.w_long);
00153         else if (av->a_type==A_FLOAT)
00154             SETFLOAT(x->m_args+i,av->a_w.w_float);
00155     }
00156     x->m_count = ac;
00157     minimum_bang(x);
00158 }
00159 
00160 void minimum_inletinfo(t_minimum *x, void *b, long a, char *t)
00161 {
00162     if (a)
00163         *t = 1;
00164 }
00165 
00166 void minimum_assist(t_minimum *x, void *b, long m, long a, char *s)
00167 {
00168     if (m == ASSIST_OUTLET)
00169         if (a == 0)
00170             sprintf(s,"Minimum Value");
00171         if (a == 1)
00172             sprintf(s, "Index of the Minimum Value");
00173     else {
00174         switch (a) {    
00175         case 0:
00176             sprintf(s,"Compares Left and Right Inlets");
00177             break;
00178         case 1:
00179             sprintf(s,"Value to be Compared");
00180             break;
00181         }
00182     }
00183 }
00184 
00185 void *minimum_new(t_symbol *s, short ac, t_atom *av)
00186 {
00187     t_minimum *x;
00188     
00189     x = (t_minimum *)newobject(minimum_class);
00190     x->m_count = 0;
00191     x->m_args = NULL;
00192     minimum_resize(x,2);
00193     x->m_out2 = intout(x);
00194     if (ac) {
00195         x->m_args[1] = *av;
00196         if (av->a_type==A_LONG) {
00197             x->m_args[0].a_type = x->m_outtype = A_LONG;
00198             x->m_out = intout(x);
00199             x->m_args[0].a_w.w_long = 0;
00200             intin(x,1);
00201         } else if (av->a_type==A_FLOAT) {
00202             x->m_args[0].a_type = x->m_outtype = A_FLOAT;
00203             x->m_out = floatout(x);
00204             x->m_args[0].a_w.w_float = 0;
00205             floatin(x,1);
00206         } else {
00207             x->m_outtype = A_LONG;
00208             intin(x,1);
00209             x->m_out = intout(x);
00210             SETLONG(x->m_args+1,0L);
00211             SETLONG(x->m_args,0L);
00212         }
00213     } else {
00214         x->m_outtype = A_LONG;
00215         intin(x,1);
00216         x->m_out = intout(x);
00217         SETLONG(x->m_args+1,0L);
00218         SETLONG(x->m_args,0L);
00219     }
00220     return x;
00221 }
00222 
00223 void minimum_free(t_minimum *x)
00224 {
00225     if (x->m_args)
00226         sysmem_freeptr(x->m_args);
00227 }
00228 
00229 void minimum_resize(t_minimum *x, long size)
00230 {
00231     if (size!=x->m_count) {
00232         if (x->m_args)
00233             sysmem_freeptr(x->m_args);
00234         if (size)
00235             x->m_args = (t_atom *)sysmem_newptr(size*sizeof(t_atom));
00236         else
00237             x->m_args = NULL;
00238         x->m_count = size;
00239     }
00240 }
